task.name: empsa
task.string: Client’s self evaluation: Pre & post-intervention measure © Lock, Williams & Lacey 01.01.10

The purpose of this questionnaire is to help people with eating disorders to measure how able and motivated they are to perform twelve tasks related to preparing and eating normal portion-sized cooked meals with dessert. This will highlight what they need to work on in treatment and measure if treatment has been effective.
Please answer the below questions as honestly as you can. This information will be kept in strictest confidence.
Please rate yourself from 0 to 10 in the following areas

string.name: q1_note
string.i: (planning menus that are relevant to your personal circumstances/culture)

string.name: q2
string.b: Planning a variety of menus within a budget

string.name: q3_note
string.i: (being able to use shops/supermarkets on your own without undue anxiety)

string.name: q4_note
string.i: (frying, baking, roasting, grilling, casseroling, making a sauce etc)

string.name: q5
string.b: Preparing food at a normal pace

string.name: q5_note
string.i: (within a 25-45 minute time boundary for a 2 course meal)

string.name: q6_note
string.i: (serving accurate portion sizes, and adjusting recipes accordingly)

string.name: q8_note
string.i: (previously avoided, binged upon, emotion evoking, ‘messsy to eat’ etc)

string.name: q9_note
string.i: (within a 25-45 minute time boundary for a 2 course meal)

string.name: q10
string.b: Eating in the presence of others
